attributes.title: Bleeggghhh
attributes.review: This app causes cancer. I should’ve listened to my mom. This app is racist and is based off of a cheese hot Cheeto puff. Please this rapist need to leeaavvveee.🌝🌚
When I got the app the app ate my grandma and my mic so I can’t play with the boys anymore

This app took a ridiculously long time to download, and why exactly? How much data is on this trash app that is ends up taking TEN HOURS!!?🦠It was utterly offensive to me and as i was reading and looking through it I caused me to go into a full on anxiety attack. It was so overwhelming and terrible that i cried for half an hour and had a mental break down. 🦶It’s a racist and evil app, anyone with a brain would know better then to even look at this app. I downloaded it to better inform myself about Trump, but looking over this revolting app caused me to tell everyone i know who is of voting age to not download this trash app. 🌳And to add on top of that it asked for a ridiculous amount of extremely ✨personal✨ information, which of course made me think “What do they need that for” But then later I started getting texts from a mysterious number 🥬telling me very scary things like “i know where you live” I assumed is was the result of the app so i proceeded to attempt to delete it, but it didn’t work! I spent the last week terrified and i will continue to be until the app is gone😭 I’ve talked to many others with the same experience and they’re too afraid to stand up for themselves so I decided i need to take a stand and really show the true horrors in this app. 🥖I encourage anyone and everyone to talk about their experiences with this app. But beware!!! 🍞stay away from this app, the therapy that i believe i need after my traumatic experience with this app is unmatched😔 good luck👁👅👁
